reference.title: TRCDEVAFF0, Device Affinity Register 0
reference.shortdesc: The TRCDEVAFF0 provides an additional core identification mechanism for scheduling purposes in a cluster. TRCDEVAFF0 is a read-only copy of MPIDR accessible from the external debug interface.

section.title: Bit field descriptions
section.p: The TRCDEVAFF0 is a 32-bit register and is a copy of the MPIDR register. See MPIDR_EL1, Multiprocessor Affinity Register, EL1The MPIDR_EL1 provides an additional core identification mechanism for scheduling purposes in a cluster. for full bit field descriptions.
